list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Create flash_cards app with models and integrate it into project
Added models for User, Deck, Card, UserHistory, and Comment in the flash_cards app to support core application functionality. Updated project settings to use the custom User model and included flash_cards URLs in the main project URL configuration. Adjusted SECRET_KEY handling and other minor settings for improved environment configuration.

component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary: initialize Django project structure and configuration files

Initialize Django project "MindShaft"
Set up core structure for the "MindShaft" Django project, including settings, URLs, WSGI/ASGI configurations, and default app scaffolding. Also added basic files for models, views, tests, and admin setup within the "mind_shaft" app.

Rename 'mind_shaft' app to 'flash_cards'.
Updated app configuration, file paths, and references to reflect the renaming of the Django app from 'mind_shaft' to 'flash_cards'. Ensures consistency across the project and maintains functionality.

Initialize Django project and configure environment settings
Added base project structure for "MindShaft" with Django settings, templates, and static files configuration. Integrated environment variable support, Heroku settings, dynamic database connections, and user model customization. Updated `.idea` metadata, dependencies, and `.gitignore` to complete setup.

Create flash_cards app with models and integrate it into project
Added models for User, Deck, Card, UserHistory, and Comment in the flash_cards app to support core application functionality. Updated project settings to use the custom User model and included flash_cards URLs in the main project URL configuration. Adjusted SECRET_KEY handling and other minor settings for improved environment configuration.
